original_text: He must use the special stones. They will help him to decide what he should do. He must decide which goat is for the Lord. And he must decide which goat he must send away.
korean_text: 두 염소를 위하여 제비 뽑되 한 제비는 여호와를 위하고 한 제비는 아사셀을 위하여 할지며

sentences.original_text: He must use the special stones.
They will help him to decide
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들은 그가 결정하는 것을 도와줄 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: He must decide which goat is for the Lord.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 어떤 염소가 주님을 위한 것인지 결정해야 합니다.

sentences.original_text: which goat he must send away.
